greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Matula-numbers computed for rooted trees encoded by A071162 when interpreted in once-halved bit-tuple format.
comment: Sequence A209638 gives the same terms sorted into ascending order.
reference: Mueller, Szymanski, Knop and Trinajstic, A Comparison between the Matula Numbers and Bit-tuple Notation for Rooted Trees J. Chem. Inf. Comput. Sci. 1995, 35, pp. 211--213.
program: def a(n): return 1 if n==0 else a209636(a054429(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 26 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 11 2012
